item.description:
We will be meeting in E51-335 not 376!

There will be a special presentation by Kieran McDonough. Here are the details"

Topic: CANSLIM bases and breakouts
Description:
Kieran McDonough is a Raymond James-based money manager using CANSLIM techniques. He travels the country presenting Level 1 seminars for Investors Business Daily. His presentation will target bases and breakouts, the topic area that members ask about regularly at our meetings. He will include some discussion of "3 weeks tight", the technique that members ask about for catching breakouts after they have broken out. There will be time for a Q & A session with Kieran.

Here is a map:
http://whereis.mit.ed...
Best parking is behind E552, E53, entrance on Main Street.

For more information, see http://whereis.mit.ed...
item.name: The Boston Investor's Business Daily June Meetup
